plot outline: The story of a disheartened dancer and a disabled boy -- both of whose lives are transformed by the magic and power of Chhou, a traditional Bengali dance of great spectacle and color -- is recounted movingly, if improbably, by a renowned Bollywood choreographer.
title: Lal Pahare'r Katha
akas: A Story of the Red Hills (United States)
